name: gastro-acid
effect:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user hurls up its
stomach acids on
the foe. The fluid
eliminates the effect
of the foe’s ability.
